description:
In part thanks to Hikaru and Daigo`s battery, the Mifune Dolphins win their first match of the summer tournament.
Head coach Tashiro can`t hold back his tears after finally achieving the victory of his dreams.
However, Andy`s injury from the match puts him out for 10 days, which makes the team uneasy when thinking about the 2nd match next week.
Amidst all of that, Mutsuko, who was only able to watch the team win the first match from the bench, 
couldn`t fully banish the unpleasant feelings when she thought about how Daigo and Hikaru got to help the team on the field.
Source: crunchyroll
